name: Big Chef Mecha
description:
CONTROLLER IS REQUIRED!

The Town is under attack. The gourmet monster Stewart is hungry and he wants stew! Two of the best chefs came together to cook the best stew ever! You better start preparing or he might destroy the whole city! 

The game is intended to be played by 2 players which control only controller - left and right side of the controller, but it can also be played alone, so you won't miss out on the experience!

How to play:

Prepare the food the monster wants, use the ingame button prompts and stir the pot with the spoon after you put in the right ingredient!

But be careful, the monster doesn't like it if you mix in the wrong ingredients!

made during United Game Jam 2020
